1836.verse: قَالَ|He said,|73|98|309$فَٱخْرُجْ|"Then get out|112|161|6274$مِنْهَا|of it,|58|107|246$فَإِنَّكَ|for indeed, you|120|169|5398$رَجِيمٌ|(are) expelled.|116|140|9770$

1837.verse: وَإِنَّ|And indeed,|98|132|713$عَلَيْكَ|upon you|81|148|2245$ٱللَّعْنَةَ|(will be) the curse|141|208|9771$إِلَىٰ|till|53|120|118$يَوْمِ|(the) Day|84|118|10$ٱلدِّينِ|(of) [the] Judgment."|162|162|11$

1838.verse: قَالَ|He said,|73|81|309$رَبِّ|"O my Lord!|97|113|7$فَأَنظِرْنِىٓ|Then give me respite|159|175|9772$إِلَىٰ|till|53|69|118$يَوْمِ|(the) Day|84|100|10$يُبْعَثُونَ|they are raised."|130|138|6277$

1839.verse: قَالَ|He said,|73|109|309$فَإِنَّكَ|"Then indeed you,|140|213|5398$مِنَ|(are) of|71|144|156$ٱلْمُنظَرِينَ|the ones given respite.|173|209|6278$

1841.verse: قَالَ|He said,|73|87|309$رَبِّ|"My Lord!|82|110|7$بِمَآ|Because|75|103|43$أَغْوَيْتَنِى|You misled me,|119|147|6279$لَأُزَيِّنَنَّ|surely, I will make (evil) fair-seeming|263|277|9775$لَهُمْ|to them|72|97|98$فِى|in|48|98|89$ٱلْأَرْضِ|the earth|92|142|100$وَلَأُغْوِيَنَّهُمْ|and I will mislead them|170|220|9776$أَجْمَعِينَ|all|95|120|1408$

1842.verse: إِلَّا|Except,|70|105|86$عِبَادَكَ|Your slaves|96|166|9777$مِنْهُمُ|among them|101|171|2906$ٱلْمُخْلَصِينَ|the ones who are sincere."|198|233|8914$

1844.verse: إِنَّ|Indeed,|70|83|58$عِبَادِى|My slaves,|90|116|1611$لَيْسَ|not|61|87|1763$لَكَ|you have|81|107|323$عَلَيْهِمْ|over them|87|113|22$سُلْطَـٰنٌ|any authority,|114|140|9780$إِلَّا|except|65|78|86$مَنِ|those who|89|132|1673$ٱتَّبَعَكَ|follow you,|92|177|7362$مِنَ|of|50|135|156$ٱلْغَاوِينَ|the ones who go astray."|188|231|6999$

1845.verse: وَإِنَّ|And indeed,|98|121|713$جَهَنَّمَ|Hell|69|114|2655$لَمَوْعِدُهُمْ|(is) surely the promised place for them|277|322|9781$أَجْمَعِينَ|all.|95|118|1408$

1849.verse: وَنَزَعْنَا|And We (will) remove|161|184|6396$مَا|what|53|99|262$فِى|(is) in|58|104|89$صُدُورِهِم|their breasts|113|159|6397$مِّنْ|of|50|96|53$غِلٍّ|rancor|62|85|6398$إِخْوَٲنًا|(they will be) brothers|168|207|3138$عَلَىٰ|on|63|140|52$سُرُرٍ|thrones|70|147|9787$مُّتَقَـٰبِلِينَ|facing each other.|142|181|9788$

1851.verse: ۞ نَبِّئْ|Inform|99|109|9790$عِبَادِىٓ|My slaves|85|105|1611$أَنِّىٓ|that I,|63|83|2879$أَنَا|I am|49|69|2308$ٱلْغَفُورُ|the Oft-Forgiving,|139|159|8348$ٱلرَّحِيمُ|the Most Merciful.|140|150|398$

1852.verse: وَأَنَّ|And that|78|96|3504$عَذَابِى|My punishment,|124|160|6900$هُوَ|it|48|84|298$ٱلْعَذَابُ|(is) the punishment|149|185|827$ٱلْأَلِيمُ|the most painful.|132|150|9791$

1834.verse: [Allah] said, O Iblees, what is [the matter] with you that you are not with those who prostrate?"

1835.verse: He said, "Never would I prostrate to a human whom You created out of clay from an altered black mud."

1836.verse: [Allah] said, "Then get out of it, for indeed, you are expelled.

1837.verse: And indeed, upon you is the curse until the Day of Recompense."

1838.verse: He said, "My Lord, then reprieve me until the Day they are resurrected."

1839.verse: [Allah] said, "So indeed, you are of those reprieved

1840.verse: Until the Day of the time well-known."

1841.verse: [Iblees] said, "My Lord, because You have put me in error, I will surely make [disobedience] attractive to them on earth, and I will mislead them all

1842.verse: Except, among them, Your chosen servants."

1843.verse: [Allah] said, "This is a path [of return] to Me [that is] straight.

1844.verse: Indeed, My servants - no authority will you have over them, except those who follow you of the deviators.

1845.verse: And indeed, Hell is the promised place for them all.

1846.verse: It has seven gates; for every gate is of them a portion designated."

1847.verse: Indeed, the righteous will be within gardens and springs.

1848.verse: [Having been told], "Enter it in peace, safe [and secure]."

1849.verse: And We will remove whatever is in their breasts of resentment, [so they will be] brothers, on thrones facing each other.

1850.verse: No fatigue will touch them therein, nor from it will they [ever] be removed.

1851.verse: [O Muhammad], inform My servants that it is I who am the Forgiving, the Merciful.

1852.verse: And that it is My punishment which is the painful punishment.

1853.verse: And inform them about the guests of Abraham,
